questionTemplates.name: oh_oh_medHx_ageAboutAtDiagnosis
questionTemplates.title: About how old were you when you were first told you had this condition?

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_overallDescription
elements.html: This survey asks questions about Other Medical History. This is to better understand how it may affect health. It will take about 5-10 minutes to answer these questions. Please answer each question as honestly as possible. We are looking for your own answers, not what you think your doctors, family, or friends want you to say. Do not feel like you have to spend a long time on each question. The first answer that comes to you is usually the best one.
